product_name: Kokatat Gore-Tex PacLite Boater's Pants - Men's
long_description: The Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) PacLite (R) Boater's pants are simple and effective waterproof pants that pack down small and offer lots of protection on paddling trips. Made from nylon with 2-layer Gore-Tex PacLite laminate for waterproof, breathable comfort and high durability. Quality finished with permanently waterproof, factory-sealed seams. Elastic waistband with drawcord and cordlock closure provides a personalized fit. Adjustable neoprene ankle closures help seal legs and prevent leakage. Right thigh bellows pocket with rip-and-stick flap closure is self-draining and is easily accessible while seated.
short_description: The Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) PacLite (R) Boater's pants are simple and effective waterproof pants that pack down small and offer lots of protection on paddling trips.
